entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider warning for [StructLayout] usage with primary constructor #67162
  • Incremental generator not being run incrementally for selected primitive value #67160
  • Can not find any resources how to add a project to a solution using a .NET core application #67158
  • Nullable assert firing while building our Visual Studio code #67153
    17.6

Closed

  • Always show IntelliCode items at the top of completion list #46453
    Backlog
  • Using the discard operator can not be compiled #67121
  • AnalyzerDriver should not capture cancellation token #67084
  • Intellisense shows members for all types from all overloads with lambda parameter #43966
    Backlog
  • Overload completion misses generic constraint #47049
    Backlog
  • Typing should be allowed before the inline parameter hint #47016
    Backlog
  • Bring Back Function View like the old VB6 used to have, that is a valuable feature. #47005
    Backlog
  • TimeoutException: Shutting down debugging session for extension development (Connect to RoslynLanguageService) #46970
    Backlog
  • Refactor: Resolve namespaces #46833
    Backlog
  • C# 9 Analyzer: Flag suspect pattern usages #46637
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: Delegate Auto Complete #46278
    Backlog
  • Code editor goes wild when entering a regex #46507
    Backlog
  • autoformatting curley braces causes repeated crashes #45445
    Backlog
  • Didn't throw warning for the suppression operator #45420
    Backlog
  • Codelens reference links are added to selected field last #45395
    Backlog
  • Add Page Number References that actively updates in '//' comments #45358
    Backlog
  • Positional record constructor invocation highlights the entire declaration #45275
    Backlog
  • cntrl+Q search fails to find symbols in folder view #45084
    Backlog
  • Avoid accessing Workspace.CurrentSolution in CodeAction.PostProcessChangesAsync #42779
    Backlog
  • Autocompletion for Search and Replace #44842
    Backlog
  • Unable to rename a variable containing an underscore. #44825
    Backlog
  • Move method parameter left or right with a key combination #44625
    Backlog
  • GenerateProperty/Field: consider adjusting behavior for positional records #44557
    Backlog
  • Figure out QuickInfo for positional records #44556
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeGeneration.CSharpCodeGenerationService.AddMethod should be adjusted to deal with "Top-level statements" #44425
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Multitarget O# external access projects to fix issues accessing prope… #67163
    Area-Infrastructure
  • How to troubleshoot a build-time regression #67161
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Execute symbol start analyzers concurrently #67159
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Save full state in nullable walker when visiting conditional operand #67157
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issue with 'convert typeof(x) to nameof(x)' with 'nint' #67151
    Area-IDE
  • Force solution-asset system to fail if it can't find an asset for a checksum #67149
    Area-IDE
  • Show preview window for sync namespace #67147
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'go to base' on a constructor symbol #67146
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #67152
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix property initialization issue in KeyValueLogMessage #66531
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update feature status of "Primary Constructors" #67137
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix some null annotations on IDynamicFileInfoProvider #67141
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use implicit/explicit extension as syntax #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix bootstrap build #67156
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67154
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Thread cancellationToken instead of capturing it in delegates #67087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update versions to 17.6-preview3 #67148
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Snap 17.6 preview 2 #67145
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve completion results when dotting of lambda parameter #67144
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix exception when the list only contains a suggestion mode item #67132
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Do not access Workspace.CurrentSolution when cleaning up a code-action's operations. #67116
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Keep runtime version in sync with VS #67164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash of type snippets after accessibility modifier #67055
    Community
  • Use per-user temporary directories for AnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66983
    Community
  • Prevent LegacyGlobalOptionService from GC rooting PreviewWorkspace #67142
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2126581 #67077
  • Revert "Fix extraction inside anonymous function" #67133
    Area-IDE
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Support POSIX environment for build boss #67066
    Community
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Switch integration CI to Preview Scout queue #67143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't show expanded items when filter text is very short #67049
